$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Wh-where am I?$k$pTowers of...metal? They're so tall...
It appears like they could pierce the
very heavens...$k$pIs this...another dream? Why would
I dream of such a place? Why w—$k$p$Sbs1500|$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|What's wrong, Prince Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Just now, as I was resting, I had—
I believe it was a daydream... It was
strange either way.$k$pTowers that pierced the heavens...
Iron horses people rode inside of
rather than atop... No world I know.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Sounds like the world of steel to me!
Dream-King Freyr told me about it...$k$pIn exchange for living in extreme
comfort, no one who lives there
is able to dream any longer...$k$pIt is a gray world, where no álfr
can live...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Hmm... The world of steel... I'd like
to hear mo—$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Enough about the dream! We have
a nightmare all around us. Let's deal
with that first.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Right. The Dream Gate of this world
should be...umm...$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|It's this way...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Oh! Thank you, Mirabilis.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|You're *yaaawwwnnnn* welcome.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You. Wake up or I'll wake you up.
...Can I actually rely on these fools?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_HAPPY_01,0|$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|*yawn*$k$pThat way...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|What? You just said it was this way.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Oh... Did I? OK, this way, then...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Sbs150|
